title: Validated questionnaires specific to mood disorder Cohorts

priority: routine

Actions

-PrefixTitleDescriptionPriorityDefinition[x]
*1.8.1International PANAS Short Form (10) affect scaleAdminister PANAS QuestionnaireroutinePANAS
*1.8.2Custom Affect scale Administer CAS QuestionnaireroutineCustom Affect Scale
*1.8.3DSM-5 Cross Cutting Measure, Adult Version (23 items).Administer DSM5 QuestionnaireroutineDSM-5 Adult
*1.8.4Altman Self-Rating Mania ScaleAdminister ASRM Questionnaireroutine
*1.8.5National Stressful Events Survey PTSD Short Scale (NSESSS)Depending on response to DSM-5, administer NSESSS QuestionnaireroutinePTSD
*1.8.6Severity Measure for Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia)—Adult - 10Depending on response to DSM-5, administer SMSAD Questionnaireroutine
*1.8.7Adult ADHD Self-Report Scale (ASRS-v1.1) Symptom Checklist Part ADepending on response to DSM-5, administer ASRS-v1.1 QuestionnaireroutineADHD
*1.8.8Well-being: Secure Flourishing IndexAdminister SFI Questionnaireroutine
*1.8.9Hamburg–Hannover Agitation Scale (H2A) Administer H2A Questionnaireroutine
*1.8.10Chalder Fatigue Scale 11Administer CFS 11 Questionnaireroutine
*1.8.11The Big Five Inventory–2 Extra Short Form Administer The Big Five Inventory–2 Extra Short Form  Questionnaireroutine
